[Java] Class GormToCassandraTransform

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
GrailsArtefactClassInjector, GrailsDomainClassInjector
@AstTransformer
public class GormToCassandraTransform

A AST transformation that turns a GORM entity into a Spring Data Cassandra entity.
